backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining authorization, user profiles, and detailed client management with progress, follow‑ups, and comparisons.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry that loads the React app and includes SheetJS for Excel export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, routing, theming, and lazy‑loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name with validation and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for activating a client plan, allowing selection of start date and follow-up day with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Dropdown button to filter clients by status, showing counts and allowing selection of filter options.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Renders a badge representing a client's status, including active, paused, expired, expiring, or onboarding states.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting client data to Excel, supporting all fields or selected fields with validation and download handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Prompt dialog for submitting follow‑up completion status and notes, with validation in manual mode.
Displays a client's follow‑up status, history, and an optional button to manually mark follow‑up as done.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client plan, validating pause duration and reason before confirming.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header, navigation, user menu, and logout handling using identity and routing hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Displays a centered spinner and message while routes are loading.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Renders weight and body measurement charts using Recharts, sorting progress data and formatting dates.
Form for submitting client progress measurements, validating inputs and calling addProgress mutation.
Displays sorted progress entries in a table with trends for weight and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides a delayed actorReady signal to avoid query conflicts during actor refetch transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, identity persistence, status flags, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user and client data, including profiles, summaries, and full client records.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with navigation and client-code extraction helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Displays detailed client info with actions for activation, pausing, progress tracking, and exports.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Shows all client summaries with filtering, searching, navigation, and export preparation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Presents client metrics and follow‑up scheduling filtered by selected weekday.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Provides a form to create new clients with onboarding state, plan duration, validation, and success flow.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Provides utilities to format client codes, normalize search queries, and compare codes against queries.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines exportable client fields and accessors for Excel output, including formatting and status mapping.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts backend errors into short, user-friendly messages with special handling for common cases.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Builds and downloads an Excel file of client data using SheetJS, auto-sizing columns and formatting values.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Computes follow-up due status, checks follow-ups recorded today, and retrieves latest follow-up entries.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats timestamps into date or datetime strings for UI or Excel output.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Calculates total plan days, computes plan end dates, and formats dates for input fields.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Determines client statuses, computes display states, and tallies dashboard status metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and session-stored parameters, including retrieval, persistence, and safe removal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s optimization goals, existing features, and new feature requests focused on improving initial client‑data load performance. It defines schema metadata and tracks requirements for streamlining data fetching and reducing unnecessary refetching.
